title: Can You Actually Nerf Lee Sin?
body:
I mean if you gave Lee Sin the same treatment you gave every other champion in this game he wouldn't be dominant in literally every season. 

For one, let's talk about his base movement speed. It's 350, that's right boys 350 units. You nerfed Yasuo because he had too much mobility. Why can't we tone it down to like 340 or 345? It seems stupid he gets the second highest base MS with two gap closers.

Also what is with his ulti? It has stupid base damages and considering it has insane amount of utility why does it do stupid damage?

How about his sustain in the jungle? What is the real reason he has lifesteal/spellvamp? Especially spellvamp he's a monk not a freaking magician. 

Anything else I'm missing out on?

Okay, even if he is a magician why does he need more sustain? I remember a comment a while back and I can't find it. But it basically said that when he had armor it was reactive but now that it's just shield and life/sustain it's literally there to just keep him healthier than you.

I do think his kit is extremely cohesive, we can't deny that. But he isn't paying for all this mobility he has. I wouldn't care if A) he had his mobility nerfed or B) his damaged nerfed.

It is called *spell* vamp, not *magic* vamp, meaning it isn't necessary needs to be an AP move to proc spell vamps, therefore, pretty much all of his moves, or spells, procs the spell vamps.

And second, what I do like to nerf is his Q. Change the % missing health damage to flat damage, like, lower flat damage. The way it uses as an assassinating move after hitting the first wave is just stupid. It should be widely known to be use as just a mobility skill, that's it.

I think this comment will immediately be down voted but in my opinion Lee Sin is pretty week right now. He literally just doesn't have enough sustain in the jungle to keep up anymore. His damage scaling could possible be nerfed. In terms of his mobility you really cant do anything about it without completely breaking him. The best way to nerf his mobility would be to reduce his movement speed but other than that his q range is strong but not game breaking. An extension on its cd would probably be the best nerf for it. The w literally can not be nerfed right now. As I said his sustain is pretty weak right now and extending w cool down would worsen it and on top of that the range isnt abnormally large on it. Idk Lee sin just feels obsolete now with the new jungle and doesn't do as well as other junglers could.
